message: This is a high-quality product worth $20000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, which is a 50% discount. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on a great deal. What do you say?
I'm not buying. I'll wait for the next product.
